justification: The candidate has a strong background in telecommunications engineering, focusing on wireless and microwave communication technologies, whereas the job requires heavy experience in electrical and electronics engineering for power system analysis.
The candidate does not have experience in power system analysis, which is critical for this role.

The leadership section is scored relatively higher based on past team and project management experience, though it is primarily in telecommunications, it still showcases some relevant transferable skills.
Lack of direct experience with data visualization tools or VBA, which were defined Micro Scores.

input.job_description:
### Lead Engineer at TechInnovate Solutions

**Join our innovative team at TechInnovate Solutions as a Lead Engineer, where you'll oversee and drive multiple engineering teams to deliver cutting-edge solutions in the field of Electrical & Electronics Engineering.**

#### Key Responsibilities:
- Lead the system studies team and coordinate with the design team to ensure high-quality project deliverables.
- Provide technical support and guidance to project teams for optimal performance.
- Oversee engineering projects from conception to completion, ensuring alignment with client expectations and timelines.
- Conduct comprehensive training programs to enhance the technical skills of team members.
- Utilize advanced knowledge of software and technologies to conduct power system analysis.
- Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to achieve project objectives and deliver exceptional results.

#### Qualifications:
- Bachelor's or Master's degree in Electrical Engineering. A PhD is preferred.
- 8 to 10 years of relevant experience in power system analysis and project management.
- Proven track record in leading engineering teams and projects effectively.

#### Location:
- Remote work available with occasional travel to company offices in the US, UAE, and other global locations.
- Relocation assistance available for qualified candidates.

details.name: Saeed Iqbal

projects.title: Smart Huawei Modernization Project / Change-Out
projects.description: Involved in installation and commissioning of Huawei equipment.

details.executive_summary: Saeed Iqbal is an experienced Wireless Integration Engineer with a strong background in telecommunications, specializing in wireless services and integration across multiple generations of mobile technology. He has demonstrated expertise in managing complex projects and ensuring operational excellence in various roles within the industry.

employment_history.details: Responsibilities include providing remote delivery of wireless services and conducting pre-checks and post-checks for site integration.
Supervised operations and provided technical solutions for wireless integration projects.
Managed operations and maintenance for telecommunication networks, ensuring compliance with specifications.
Coordinated field operations and managed installation and commissioning of cellular network equipment.
Involved in installation and commissioning of Huawei BTS and transmission nodes, performing site audits and maintenance.
Installed and commissioned Huawei BTS and transmission nodes, conducting various tests and documentation.
